item.description:
We'll brunch in May at 1149 Restaurant in Warwick

This is a brunch buffet for $24.95 for adults and features a live classical guitarist

Please RSVP by May 15 so I can confirm our headcount with the restaurant

Here's their website to check out:

http://www.elevenfort...

Their brunch menu:

JUICES:
FRESHLY SQUEEZED ORANGE JUICE, FRESHLY SQUEEZED GRAPEFRUIT JUICE, LOCAL APPLE CIDER

SOUP STATION:
1149 CHOWDER W/ CORN & POTATO
CHIEFâ€™S FIREHOUSE CHILI W/ SOUR CREAM, JALAPENO & CHEDDAR
SOUP OF THE DAY

BREADS & PASTRY STATION:
MINI MUFFINS, MINI DANISHES, SCONES, CINNAMON BUNS, CROISSANTS, ASSORTED MINI ROLLS,

GRANOLA & LOW-FAT YOGURT

ASSORTED BAGELS W/ SLICED SMOKED SALMON & ASSORTED CREAM CHEESES

OMELET STATION:
ORGANIC EGGS
INGREDIENTS:
GRILLED CHICKEN, BABY SHRIMP, SPINACH, HAM, BROCCOLI, SUN-DRIED TOMATO, MUSHROOMS, GRILLED ZUCCHINI & YELLOW SQUASH, RED ONION, ANDOUILLE SAUSAGE, HAM, OLIVES, ROASTED RED PEPPER
&
CHEESES: FETA, GOAT, SWISS-GRUYERE, CHEDDAR

SEASONAL FRUIT DISPLAY:
CANTALOUPE, HONEYDEW MELON, WATERMELON, CALIFORNIA ORANGES, SEEDLESS RED & GREEN GRAPES, ASSORTED BERRIES (WHEN IN SEASON), PINEAPPLE

CARVING STATION:
A SELECTION OF:
HOUSE-ROASTED ORGANIC TURKEY BREAST
DELMONICO RIBEYE STEAK
HONEY-DIJON GLAZED VIRGINA HAM
HERB-ROASTED PORK LOIN
ROSEMARY & GARLIC ROASTED LEG OF LAMB
WITH: 1149 KETCHUP, SEASONAL CHUTNEY, HORSERADISH CREAM

CHAFING STATION:
A SELECTION OF:
BREAKFAST SAUSAGE
APPLE-WOOD SMOKED BACON
THREE POTATO HASH W/ FRESH HERBS & CARAMELIZED ONIONS
GRATIN POTATO & GREMOLATA-BAKED SALMON
BLUE CRAB STUFFED FILLET OF SOLE W/ NEWBURG SAUCE
TENDER TIPS W/ MUSHROOMS BURGUNDY
1149 CHICKEN MARSALA
THICK-CUT PORTUGUESE BREAD FRENCH TOAST
BUTTERMILK PANCAKES W/ VERMONT MAPLE SYRUP

SALAD STATION
MIXED SPRING GREENS & ROMAINE LETTUCE W/VINE-RIPENED TOMATO, CUCUMBERS, RED ONION, SHREDDED CARROT, OLIVES, CHICK PEAS, ROASTED RED PEPPERS, BLACK BEANS, ARTICHOKES, TORTELLINI SALAD, ROASTED BEETS, ASIAN SLAW, CROUTONS, FRESH MOZZARELLA
&
BALSAMIC DRESSING, RASPBERRY DRESSING, LEMON-POPPYSEED VINAIGRETTE, ASIAN DRESSING, CAESAR, RANCH

PASTA STATION:
TORTELLINI & PENNE PASTA
1149 MARINARA SAUCE & THREE CHEESE CREAM SAUCE
INGREDIENTS:
GARLIC, GRILLED CHICKEN, BABY SHRIMP, SPINACH, HAM, BROCCOLI, SUN-DRIED TOMATOES, MUSHROOMS, GRILLED ZUCCHINI & YELLOW SQUASH, RED ONION, ANDOUILLE SAUSAGE, TASSO HAM, OLIVES, ROASTED RED PEPPERS, PESTO
&
PARMESAN CHEESE


Sounds great !!! I'm really looking forward to visiting 1149. Hope you are too.
item.name: May Brunch - 1149 Restaurant, Warwick
